content.text: How to Use JavaScript for AI and ML
JavaScript can be utilized for AI and machine learning (ML) through libraries and frameworks that enable data manipulation and model training.
Libraries for AI and ML in JavaScript
Popular JavaScript libraries for AI and ML include TensorFlow.js, Brain.js, and Synaptic, allowing developers to build and train neural networks.
JavaScript can handle data using libraries like D3.js for visualization and SimpleStatistics for statistical operations to prepare datasets for modeling.
AI models built with JavaScript can be deployed directly in web browsers, enabling real-time predictions and interactions.
